description:
Traited class [tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne]

4D model describing the Ott-Antonsen reduction of infinite all-to-all coupled QIF neurons (Theta-neurons) as in [Coombes_Byrne_2019].

Note: the original equations describe the dynamics of the Kuramoto parameter \(Z\). Using the conformal transformation \(Z=(1-W^\star)/(1+W^\star)\) and \(W= \pi r + i V\), we express the system dynamics in terms of two state variables \(r\) and \(V\) representing the average firing rate and the average membrane potential of our QIF neurons. The conductance variable and its derivative are \(g\) and \(q\).

The equations of the model read

\begin{align*} \dot{r} &= \Delta/\pi + 2 V r - g r^2 \\ \dot{V} &= V^2 - \pi^2 r^2 + \eta + (v_{syn} - V) g \\ \dot{g} &= \alpha q \\ \dot{q} &= \alpha (\kappa \pi r - g - 2 q) \end{align*}
[Coombes_Byrne_2019]Coombes, S., & Byrne, Á. (2019). Next generation neural mass models. In Nonlinear Dynamics in Computational Neuroscience (pp. 1-16). Springer, Cham.

Attributes declared

Delta : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.Delta = NArray(label='\(\\Delta\)', dtype=float64, default=array([0.5]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Half-width of heterogeneous noise distribution
alpha : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.alpha = NArray(label='\(\\alpha\)', dtype=float64, default=array([0.95]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Parameter of the alpha-function
v_syn : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.v_syn = NArray(label='\(v_{syn}\)', dtype=float64, default=array([-10.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
QIF membrane reversal potential
k : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.k = NArray(label='\(k\)', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Local coupling strength
eta : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.eta = NArray(label='\(\\eta\)', dtype=float64, default=array([20.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the firing rate variable to itself
state_variable_range : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.state_variable_range = Final(field_type=<class 'dict'>, default={'r': array([0., 6.]), 'V': array([-10., 10.]), 'g': array([1., 2.]), 'q': array([-0.5, 0.7])}, required=True)
Expected ranges of the state variables for initial condition generation and phase plane setup.

state_variable_boundaries : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.state_variable_boundaries = Final(field_type=<class 'dict'>, default={'r': array([ 0., inf])}, required=True)

variables_of_interest : tvb.simulator.models.infinite_theta.CoombesByrne.variables_of_interest = List(of=<class 'str'>, default=('r', 'V'), required=True)
The quantities of interest for monitoring for the Infinite QIF 2D oscillator.
